page.title: 17COOK'S CORNER FARM
page.content:
The farm is strictly outside our area, at GR 414136, but we visited it as it is fairly typical of farms around Freeland. It is owned by Mr Symington who lives at The Manor House in Long Hanborough.
His farming has changed over the 12 years that he has owned it. He used to keep cattle for meat, now he only grows crops but he does let animals graze on his farm. In spring he does some cultivating and fertilizing and sows crops, in summer he deals with the harvest and burns stubble and in autumn he ploughs and most of his crops are sown. He has one old age pensioner to help him with odd jobs like cutting grass and driving tractors. He also keeps 23 hens, 8 geese and about 24 cockerels for Christmas.
